summary: THE ABS LIGHT AND THE TRACTION CONTROL LIGHT COMES ON WHEN STARTING CAR AND CHIMES AND THE SERVICE TRACTION CONTROL IS DISPLAYED ON DASH. THEN WHEN STARTING TO DRIVE AND STOPPING BRAKE PEDAL SEAMS SOFT. AFTER DRIVING ABOUT A MILE THE LIGHTS GO OFF AND BRAKING IS NORMAL. IT SEAMS LIKE IT'S THE ABS CONTROL. THERE HAS BEAN A RECALL ON EARLIER MODEL YEARS TO REPLACE ABS CONTROL ASSEMBLY.
